message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper focuses on natural language processing techniques for indexing and retrieving Arabic texts, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper proposes an algorithm for enhancing information retrieval in Arabic texts, which is the main focus of this sub-category. 
3. cs.LG (Learning): The paper mentions using machine learning techniques for stemming, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper uses natural language processing and machine learning techniques, which are both sub-fields of AI. 
5. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing): Although the paper does not explicitly mention neural or evolutionary computing, it does mention using machine learning techniques, which can fall under the scope of this sub-category.
